tagline: pure socket no framework :: IRC Qik Bot ~ its a babbling IRC Bot very quick to setup and act ;) aiming to be intelligent
name: irc-qik-bot
body:
### irc-qik-bot ~ automated babbling bot

GitHub: https://github.com/abhishekkr/irc-qik-bot/

RubyGems: http://rubygems.org/gems/irc-qik-bot

***

usage currently require the 'bot nick' to be used; 
    will also pin it to conventional !command
  
  Current Features:
*     basic IRC Network, Channel Connector
*     Help             ~ 'qbot: help'
*     Babbler          ~ 'qbot: babble'
*     Quote            ~ 'qbot: quote'
*     URL Un-Shortener ~ 'qbot: unshort http://SHORT_URL'
*     google           ~ 'qbot: google search term'
  
# gem install irc-qik-bot

======================================================================

  Future Roadmap:
*     YAML Config Support
*     whois
*     nslookup
*     ycombinator
*     twitter
*     reddit
*     slashdot
*     stackoverflow
*     github

### Authors and Contributors
@abhishekkr

### Support or Contact
* mail: [abhikumar163@gmail.com](mailto:abhikumar163@gmail.com)
* twitter: [http://twitter.com/aBionic](http://twitter.com/aBionic)
